name: thedailybeast
text: Last year, before Trump’s July 4th fireworks celebration at Mount Rushmore, a White House aide reportedly contacted South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem’s office to inquire about the steps that need to be taken to add more presidents to the national memorial. https://t.co/GDCZNxi3S3

name: thedailybeast
text:
Trump used the patriarchal nature of politics to propel him to victory in 2016. This time even that might not be on his side.
